descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Prepare to Enter Blackgate Station

A zero-gravity multiplayer horror game where every player has a unique role to play, inspired by Dead by Daylight and Echo Arena. Up to **4 Engineers** are pit against an evolving **Alien** specimen controlled by a **5th player**. Join us in Early Access!

[media]
As an engineer, you and your team are sent to repair **BlackGate** station. Your mission is clear: restore **crucial systems**, unlock the **Armory**, and most importantly—stay alive. Each engineer plays a crucial role in the survival of their team. 
[media]
Navigating the station isn’t easy. Using your thrusters and environment, you’ll need to push and pull your way through zero gravity, watching your back at every turn. 
[media]
The Alien begins inside the nest deep within the ship, working its way towards its prey. As the specimen, your goal is simple but deadly. You start in a weak, larval form—but every engineer you harm makes you stronger.
[media]
Once you **evolve**, you unlock new abilities—becoming a lethal monster capable of taking on the engineers head-to-head, or luring them into debilitating traps. 
[media] 

If the Engineers arm themselves, the tables could turn. In **BlackGate**, the clock is always ticking. Will the engineers work together to repair the station and take down the alien, or will the specimen evolve into an unstoppable force and claim victory? 

**© 2025 Megaverse LLC, a Fun Train® company.**

A zero-gravity multiplayer horror game where every player has a unique role to play, inspired by Dead by Daylight and Echo Arena. Up to **4 Engineers** are pit against an evolving **Alien** specimen controlled by a **5th player**. Join us in Early Access!

As an engineer, you and your team are sent to repair **BlackGate** station. Your mission is clear: restore **crucial systems**, unlock the **Armory**, and most importantly—stay alive. Each engineer plays a crucial role in the survival of their team.

Navigating the station isn’t easy. Using your thrusters and environment, you’ll need to push and pull your way through zero gravity, watching your back at every turn.

The Alien begins inside the nest deep within the ship, working its way towards its prey. As the specimen, your goal is simple but deadly. You start in a weak, larval form—but every engineer you harm makes you stronger.

If the Engineers arm themselves, the tables could turn. In **BlackGate**, the clock is always ticking. Will the engineers work together to repair the station and take down the alien, or will the specimen evolve into an unstoppable force and claim victory?
